about_the_game:
Join the discord!


Jetpack Battle is an exhilarating 3D shooter that will transport you to a world of high-flying action and intense battles. Inspired by the classic game Starsiege: Tribes 1, Jetpack Battle combines wide open terrains, thrilling jetpack-powered flight, and intense Capture the Flag gameplay to deliver an adrenaline-pumping experience like no other.

Prepare to engage in epic battles across vast landscapes, where strategic maneuvering and fast-paced combat are the keys to victory. Master the art of skiing, effortlessly gliding over the terrain while maintaining your momentum and evading enemy fire. With your trusty jetpack, you'll soar through the skies, unleashing devastating firepower upon your foes from above.

Choose from an arsenal of futuristic weapons, each with its own unique capabilities, and customize your loadout to suit your playstyle. Whether you prefer long-range precision, close-quarters mayhem, or explosive area control, Jetpack Battle offers a diverse array of options to suit every player's preferences.

Form a team with friends or join forces with players from around the world as you compete in heart-pounding Capture the Flag matches. Coordinate your strategies, communicate effectively, and use your jetpack skills to outmaneuver your opponents, capture their flag, and secure victory for your team.

Immerse yourself in stunning environments, meticulously crafted to provide a visually striking backdrop to the chaotic battles. From lush jungles to barren deserts, every map in Jetpack Battle offers unique challenges and opportunities for tactical gameplay.

With its fast-paced combat, skill-based movement mechanics, and thrilling team-based matches, Jetpack Battle redefines the shooter genre. Get ready to experience the ultimate adrenaline rush as you take to the skies, dominate the battlefield, and become a legend in the world of Jetpack Battle!

name: Jetpack Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Vertical FPS. Skiing, Jetpacks, and speed!
